availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Marcus L. Thomas (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Thomas and Margaret Thomas. Married to Temperance J. Sams Thomas in Estill County, Kentucky, on September 30, 1847. Father of Henry F. Thomas and Naomi Thomas. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Farmer in Estill County in 1863. Died in Estill County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 50B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 208.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Estill County, KY, July 1863, p. 156.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 161.
"Marcus Lindsey Thomas (1824-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial #30068880, accessed December 8, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30068880.
